attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that if the army is undermanned they should make it that if a British Citizen does not have a job for over 6 months and they are not at college or university they should be made to join the army. Also we know that people don't like the bad people that are allowed to walk free because the prisons are over crowded well they should be made to join the army aswell.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
